short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension built to do few internal checks RTHM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The MMD - RTHM - LTD Extension is a internal tool which simplifies listing management for marketplace managers, offering seamless integration with Google Sheets and robust tools to manage, analyze, and enhance product listings. It enables quick data synchronization, duplicate prevention, and performance tracking, making it an indispensable tool for campaign and e-commerce managers.
